solution_line_template: A total of {bottles_per_crate} x {num_crates} = <<{bottles_per_crate}*{num_crates}={bottles_in_crates}>>{bottles_in_crates} bottles will be placed in {num_crates} crates.
Therefore, {total_bottles} - {bottles_in_crates} = <<{total_bottles}-{bottles_in_crates}={bottles_not_in_crate}>>{bottles_not_in_crate} bottles will not be placed in a crate.
